sqlMap.statement: create table if not exists $tableName$ ( id int(11) not null AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, log_type int(11) not null default -100, log_time bigint not null, region_id int(11) , server_id int(11) , account_id bigint not null, account_name varchar(128), level bigint , reason int(11) , param text, gold_delta bigint , gold_left bigint , createTime bigint not null ,key account_id (account_id) ,key account_name (account_name) )ENGINE = MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8
